sql.where:
enabled = 1
and
title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
category like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select:
select * from tbl_notice
order by nno desc limit #{skip}, #{perSheet}
select * from tbl_notice where showed = 1 order by nno desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tbl_notice (nno,title,content,writer,showed, category,img,file) values(#{nno},#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{showed},#{category},#{img},#{file})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set enabled = 0 where nno = #{nno};
update tbl_notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, category=#{category}, img=#{img}, file=#{file}, showed=#{showed}, updatedate=now() where nno = #{nno};
mapper.select: select tbl_notice.nno, fileName, uploadPath, uuid, image from tbl_notice left join tbl_notice_file tnf on tbl_notice.nno = tnf.nno where tbl_notice.nno = #{nno} and tnf.image = 1 group by tbl_notice.nno order by tbl_notice.nno desc
